fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On Monday, perform an Investigator (35) check on a target.
- On Tuesday, roleblock a player.
- On Wednesday, grant a target Powerful defense.
- On Thursday, redirect a player to a player of your choice.
- On Friday, transport two players.
- On Saturday, attack a player.
- On Sunday, gain 3 anonymous votes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities are based off of the current day in the EDT timezone.
- If the day switches in between a phase, cope, seethe, and mald, because the ability changes too and your target stays the same unless you change it. The host may choose to delay the game for you but is not obligated to do so.
- You may alternatively queue an ability use if the day switches.
- Your Sunday votes are completely anonymous and may be distributed to different people. They are seen as "Sunday Timekeeper".
- If it becomes Monday when you've placed anonymous votes, those votes are removed.
